org.daisy.common.xpath.saxon

Class ReflexiveExtensionFunctionProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.common.xpath.saxon.ReflexiveExtensionFunctionProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtensionFunctionProvider

    public abstract class ReflexiveExtensionFunctionProvider
extends Object
implements ExtensionFunctionProvider
    Poor man's implementation of Saxon's reflexive extension function mechanism, which is only available in the PE and EE versions.

      protected <T> void addExtensionFunctionDefinitionsFromClass(Class<T> definition, T object)
      This method can be used to add function definitions if for some reason it can not be done at construction time.

      • ReflexiveExtensionFunctionProvider

        protected ReflexiveExtensionFunctionProvider(Class<T> definition,
                                             T object)
        Parameters:
        object - When non-null, use this instance of the definition class to invoke all instance methods on. In other words, it is used as the implicit first argument of all functions that correspond to instance methods.
